name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Inspect for damage and wear, Confirm items are correct as per drawings and Specifications
Acceptance Criteria - DI Pipes shall be DN150 PN35 with cement mortar or concrete lining
○ Material and fittings are approved as per contract specification
Verifying Document - Photos, delivery docket, MDD results for backfill materials
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Allignment set out completed by an approved surveyor marked allignment
Acceptance Criteria - Set out matches drawings, 2D data and linework provided or aggreed with the Engineer
Frequency - Prior to commencement of works
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Excavate to acheive required depth to invert as per drawing C4500
○ Floor of trench to be even across width and length
○ Allow for minimum cover of 750mm. Max cover not exceeding 1000mm unless shown on Drawings C4500
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Scala tests on base of trench
Acceptance Criteria - minimum of 2 blows per 100mm
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, On site test
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pipes installed and positioned as per design
Acceptance Criteria - Pipe not damaged during installation
○ Pipe is centrally located within trench
○ Pipe levels are within tolerance and according to the drawings
Verifying Document - Photos, Survey of position for asbuilt
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Embedment material shall be AP20 or approved by the Engineer in writing
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Backfill material shall be AP65
○ Backfill in 200mm layers of compacted material
○ Compaction testing one test every two layers as required
○ Conductive signal strip to be laid at 300mm above pipe
Acceptance Criteria - 95% MDD in roads, paths, and pavements
Verifying Document - Photos, Compaction test results
Frequency - During Installation, compaction testing per 50m of pipeline
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, On Site test
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Non PE pipelines to be tested in accordance with specifications
Acceptance Criteria - Specification WM 4.6.1: No Thrust block failures, No visible leaks, Do not exceed make-up water limit.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Disinfection to be completed in accordance with specifications

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Disinfection to be completed in accordance with specifications

Acceptance Criteria - Items are approved as per contract specification or as agreed by the engineer

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Ducting installed and positioned as per design
Acceptance Criteria - Duct not damaged during installation
○ Minimum of 150mm horizontal and vertical clearence from other services or as specified on Drawings C4600, C4500
Verifying Document - Photos, Survey of position for asbuilt, weld records (if required)
